attributes.action: apply more restrictions in keeping pigeons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to limit the number of pigeons being kept in coops/lofts on private property and to limit their flying times in open space, in order to tackle the problem of pigeon mess which causes distruction to buildings and other persons possessions.  Also to address real term regulations on feeding, to stop the spread of vermin, such as infestation of rats which also cause damage to property,not forgetting health problems/issues to asthma sufferers, again caused by uncontrolled pigeon faniciers/ breeders in the private sector. Finally to have the right to enjoy life without pigeons around you all day.
